[color=#ffffff][b]GROUP PREFIXES[/b][/color]
Group owners received a new perk for their group whenever [mention=1] implemented custom group prefixes for threads. Users will have the option to select from a list of custom usergroup themes to give their threads a little flair and eye-catching colors. For legal reasons I'm obligated to inform you that this was [mention=4227846] 's idea. For further details, check out [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6245869][i]this thread.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]THE FALLEN HAVE ARRIVED[/b][/color]
 [mention=7] has purchased former group ''[i]Revenge[/i],'' and rebranded it to, "[i]Fallen[/i]." There is no official thread for this usergroup and the terms for entry are relatively unknown. The new owner was asked what their intentions were with the new group, in which they responded;
[i]"2 plans.... increase content and activity and a group dedicated to blackhat."[/i] The most relative discussion can be found by clicking [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6245862][i]here.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]GROUP & CREW NEWS[/b][/color]

 [mention=1342286] is offering users a chance to lease his group to any approved member looking to lead an official usergroup. [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6244841][i](source)[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]Succubus[/b][/color] is still listed for sale by [mention=3604010] 
[color=#ffffff][b]Marketers[/b][/color] is still listed for sale by [mention=4227846] 

[color=#ffffff][b]Revenge[/b][/color] has been purchased by [mention=7]

[b][color=#ffffff]BlackCats[/color][/b] crew is still listed for sale by [mention=1961000]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/904SqMN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]SEASON 2 COMING TO AN END[/b][/color]
[mention=1] has announced the end-date for the second season of Hackuman. As of today, August 1st, the second season will have ended, and the third season starts. In a thread, there have been discussions of new incentives to offer crews and members for getting more involved in the Hack Forum game. Join in on the conversation and share your opinions [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6247982][i]here.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]12-YEARS OF HACK FORUMS[/b][/color]
I wrote a feedback/testimonial thread for my 12 year anniversary as a member of Hack Forums. Some might say it's worthy of a Nobel Prize in Literature, others might say it's worthy of throwing in the trash. Nonetheless, this thread covers some general feedback and a trip down memory lane that might remind some veteran members of the good times. If you'd like to read it, head over to [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6247244][i]this thread .[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]BYTES FOR PROFIT[/b][/color]
[mention=1342286] is currently allowing buy-ins for entry into his custom usergroup, "[i]Profit[/i]." For one-thousand bytes, users will be granted membership to the group and its private sub-forum. Users who are interested can find more information [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6245375][i]here.[/i][/url]

[align=center][b][color=#ffffff]SUPPORT THE HF NEWS[/color][/b]

If you would like to support Scribe and Writ3rs, feel free to wear our support signature. If you decide to wear the [url=https://hackforums.net/usercp.php?action=editsig]signature[/url] you will be entered into a drawing where we will select one supporter and award them [color=#20d342][b]$50[/b][/color] whenever the next edition is released. This offer is exclusively for upgraded members only.[/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6248074][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/dd/1f/9k4q4dNh_o.png[/img][/url][/align]
